english.segment1: I'm so amazed by all you've done. You took my place. Because of your amazing love. I'm free today
english.segment2: You paid a debt. you did not owe. You gave your life unselfishly. You saved my soul
english.segment3: You took my wrongs and. You made them right. You broke the darkness. off my life. and now I'm walking in the light. I'm free
english.segment4: I'm free. I'm free. Free to worship You. I'm free. No more chains holding me. I walk in liberty. I'm free
english.segment5: Before You, life was incomplete. You made me whole. Searched far and wide for something true. You filled the void. I was so lost and oh so blind. The wind of your love came and blew. scales off my eyes
english.segment6: . You took my wrongs (Oh) and. You made them right(Oh). You broke the darkness(Oh). off my life
english.segment7: and now I'm walking in the light. I'm free
english.segment8: I'm free. I'm free. Free to worship You. I'm free. No more chains holding me. I walk in liberty. I'm free
english.segment9: I'm free. I'm free. Free to worship You. I'm free. No more chains holding me. I walk in liberty. I'm free
english.segment11: Oh oh oh oh. Oh oh oh oh. I am free. Oh oh oh oh. Oh oh oh oh. Yeah, I am free
english.segment12: Oh oh oh oh. Oh oh oh oh. I am free. Oh oh oh oh. Oh oh oh oh. Yeah, I am free
